meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word "televisions"
meanings.sent1: We have two tellys in our living room.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various tellys at affordable prices.
meanings.sent3: The tellys in the store seemed to be having a chat with each other.
meanings.sent4: The tellys in the electronics section stood like silent guardians.
meanings.sent5: The tellys displayed vibrant colors that mesmerized the customers.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word "telly" referring to multiple televisions.
meanings.sent1: Our family owns three tellys, one for each room.
meanings.sent2: The hotel rooms were equipped with large tellys for entertainment.
meanings.sent3: The tellys at the party were all tuned to different channels, creating chaos.
meanings.sent4: The tellys in the store window beckoned passersby with their bright screens.
meanings.sent5: The tellys in the electronics store seemed to whisper secrets of the latest shows.
